parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A malfunctioning throttle sensor switch can cause sudden acceleration, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle idles or revs up without the consumer stepping on the gas pedal
vehicle surges or accelerates out of control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the vehicle to be difficult to steer, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents, especially in cold weather.
symptoms: The power steering is hard to turn
the vehicle won't turn at all
the vehicle is difficult to turn in cold weather

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Oil Pan Corrosion and Pinhole Leaks
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion of the oil pan and the development of pinhole leaks can cause oil to leak out, leading to engine damage, overheating, and potentially causing the engine to seize, resulting in costly repairs or even complete engine failure.
symptoms: oil dripping from the bottom of the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature deterioration of engine gaskets can cause engine failure, leading to costly repairs, engine replacement, or even complete vehicle failure.
The leakage of antifreeze into the cylinder can cause engine damage, overheating, and potentially lead to engine failure, resulting in costly repairs or even complete engine failure.
Tire tread separation can cause sudden loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to serious injuries or fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure due to Unknown Causes
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure can cause sudden loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: tire does not hold air when inflated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire bulges can cause sudden loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: tire does not hold air when inflated

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake master cylinder can cause brake fluid leaks, leading to a loss of braking power, which can result in accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: brake pedal travels to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Failure Due to Component Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of brake components, such as brake pads and shoes, can cause a loss of braking power, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Vehicle does not stop when brakes are applied

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idle speed control motor can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Vehicle refuses to stop when brakes are applied
no cut-off switch to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
